title: Shockah's mods  Crafting Book[合成书,非Recipe Book]
author: jimmyzhou727
txt_content:
本帖最后由 jimmyzhou727 于 2011-7-4 14:41 编辑 

Not to be mistaken with Risugami's Recipe Book.
This mod adds a new book, that shows recipes using item that you put in it. Like - put stick in it - see all the recipes using sticks and recipes making sticks.
The crafting recipe is shapeless.
不要和 Risugami的合成书mod混淆了。
这个mod增加了一种书，能显示出你所放置在书上的物品，所相关的合成配方。就好象把木棍放在框里，可以看到所有的相关合成方式。
合成配方是无形的（不懂怎么翻译）

注意事项：
    安装方法：Put everything from "bin" folder into minecraft.jar.把压缩包内的bin文件夹 里 的东西放进minecraft.jar
